title: The King's Golden Balls
theme: The King introduces a jade ball game that drives the entire court crazy. Over tea, madness spreads — only the Lord of the Eastern Province remains sane, immune to gold, copper, and all attempts at bribery.
narrative_arc: Introduction made → World bounded → Tea served → Meeting called → Game fits perfectly → Ha! laughed → Pagoda revealed → King produces → Jade spheres → Balls presented → Present to court → Playing begins → Crazy consumed → Emperor investigates → Resplendent robes → Scores submitted → Whole court mad → Logic fled → Lord resists → Pouring attention refused → Gold offered → Copper tried → Fishing attempted → Needle threatened → Nail hammered → Inscription carved → At ease finally
narrative_story: The King wanted to introduce something new to his world. Over tea, he announced a meeting of all nobles. 'I have created a game,' he said. 'It will fit our greatness.' 'Ha!' laughed the court. They assumed he was joking. From the tallest pagoda, the King produced two jade spheres. 'Behold — the balls!' He presented them to the court. The nobles began to play. Within hours, everyone had gone crazy. The Emperor arrived to investigate. His robes were resplendent. All nobles were required to submit their scores. The whole court was consumed. Even logic had fled. Only the Lord of the Eastern Province remained sane. He refused to pour his attention into the game. The King tried bribery. He offered gold. Then copper — cheaper, but still shiny. He even tried to go fishing for the Lord's interest. Nothing worked. Finally, the King threatened him with a needle — torture by acupuncture. Still nothing. The King hammered a nail through the game board in frustration. On it, he carved an inscription: 'This game will destroy us all.' Then he sat back, suddenly at ease. Some games are meant to be lost.

characters.mnemonic_image: A person standing between two boundary lines - the act of bridging worlds
characters.story: The King wants TO INTRODUCE something new. 'JIE!' he COMMANDS the court's attention. A person stands between boundaries, bringing two worlds together. This is how new things enter — through someone willing to bridge the gap.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp announcement of new beginning
characters.narrative_position: The opening — the King's desire to innovate

characters.mnemonic_image: A field with clear boundaries - a defined realm
characters.story: Something new to his WORLD. 'JIE!' the boundaries COMMAND definition. The field has its limits, its borders clearly marked. Within these boundaries lies everything the King controls — his world, waiting for change.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp definition of boundaries
characters.narrative_position: The scope — the King's domain awaits

characters.mnemonic_image: Grass over a person under a tree - the plant that brings people together
characters.story: Over TEA, he announces. I GASP 'CHA?!' — tea at such a formal occasion? The grass grows over the person under the tree, leaves steeping into liquid that brings people together. Around tea, announcements are made.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising anticipation at the gathering
characters.narrative_position: The setting — tea brings the nobles together

characters.mnemonic_image: People gathering under a roof - assembly of nobles
characters.story: He announces a MEETING of all nobles. 'HUI!' the summons COMMANDS attendance. People gather, voices converge. Under the roof of obligation, no one can refuse the King's assembly.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp summons to gather

characters.mnemonic_image: A gathering meeting a mouth - things coming together perfectly
characters.story: 'It will FIT our greatness,' he says. I GASP 'HE?!' — does it truly match? The gathering meets the mouth — when things come together perfectly, they fit. The King promises his game will fit the court's magnificence.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising wonder at perfect match
characters.narrative_position: The promise — the game will match their greatness

characters.mnemonic_image: A mouth releasing a fit of laughter - explosive mirth
characters.story: 'HA!' laughs the court. I SING 'HAAA...' — sustained laughter echoing through the hall. The mouth releases what fits: pure mirth. They assume the King is joking. They don't know what's coming.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained laughter filling the hall
characters.narrative_position: The mockery — the court laughs too soon

characters.mnemonic_image: Earth rising in layered answers - a tower reaching skyward
characters.story: From the tallest PAGODA. I GROAN 'Taaa...' — the weight of climbing all those stairs. Earth rises in layers, each level an answer to the one below. The pagoda holds the King's greatest treasures.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural weight of ascending heights
characters.narrative_position: The reveal — the King's tower of secrets

characters.mnemonic_image: Three horizontal lines bridged by one vertical - heaven, humanity, earth united
characters.story: The KING produces. I GASP 'WANG?!' — what is he revealing? Three lines united by one: heaven, humanity, and earth all connected through the sovereign. He alone can introduce such things.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising anticipation at royal revelation
characters.narrative_position: The authority — only the King can do this

characters.mnemonic_image: A king with a precious dot - the treasure of sovereigns
characters.story: Two JADE spheres. 'YU!' the stones COMMAND reverence. The king's character with an added treasure-dot — jade belongs to royalty. These spheres glow with imperial green, worth more than provinces.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp declaration of precious value

characters.mnemonic_image: Jade being sought after - spheres everyone desires
characters.story: 'Behold — the BALLS!' I GASP 'QIU?!' — are these what we'll chase? Jade meets seeking — these spheres become the object of everyone's desire. Round, perfect, irresistible.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising desire for the precious spheres
characters.narrative_position: The object — the balls are revealed

characters.mnemonic_image: Jade made visible - treasure brought before eyes
characters.story: He PRESENTS them to the court. 'XIAN!' the gesture COMMANDS all eyes forward. Jade made visible, treasure brought before everyone. The moment of revelation has arrived.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp presentation demanding attention
characters.narrative_position: The presentation — all eyes on the balls

characters.mnemonic_image: Jade at the origin - returning to childlike delight
characters.story: The nobles begin TO PLAY. I GASP 'WAN?!' — grown men playing like children? Jade meets origin — playing returns us to our beginnings. The nobles forget their dignity, lost in the game.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising excitement at the game

characters.mnemonic_image: A dog acting like a king - madness of reversed hierarchy
characters.story: Everyone has gone CRAZY. I GASP 'KUANG?!' — what has possessed them? A dog pretending to be king — the natural order inverted. Nobles bark and scramble like hounds after the jade balls.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising alarm at spreading madness

characters.mnemonic_image: A white king - the supreme sovereign above all kings
characters.story: The EMPEROR arrives to investigate. I GASP 'HUANG?!' — even he has come? White above king — the supreme sovereign, purer and higher than any mere king. His presence silences the room momentarily.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising awe at imperial arrival

characters.mnemonic_image: Fire blazing from the emperor - dazzling imperial glory
characters.story: His robes are RESPLENDENT. I GASP 'HUANG?!' — has the sun descended? Fire meets emperor — he blazes with glory. His garments shine so bright the nobles squint, momentarily distracted from their jade obsession.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising wonder at dazzling display

characters.mnemonic_image: A mouth presenting to the king - offering up one's report
characters.story: All nobles are required TO SUBMIT their scores. I GASP 'CHENG?!' — we must report our performance? A mouth speaks to the king — submission of accounts, tallies laid before authority. No one can hide their obsession now.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising anxiety at required submission
characters.narrative_position: The accounting — scores must be reported

characters.mnemonic_image: Entering under the king's protection - completeness under royal roof
characters.story: The WHOLE court is consumed. I GASP 'QUAN?!' — everyone, without exception? Entering under the king — once inside his game, the whole becomes affected. Complete contamination of the court.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at total consumption

characters.mnemonic_image: Jade patterns in stone - the natural order of things
characters.story: Even LOGIC has fled. I GROAN 'Liii...' — the weight of losing reason. The patterns in jade — natural principles, order in chaos — all have abandoned the court. Madness has no rules.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural loss of rational ground

characters.mnemonic_image: A king with a flame of authority on top - the master of a domain
characters.story: Only the LORD of the Eastern Province remains sane. I GROAN 'Zhuuu...' — the heavy burden of being the only one untouched. King with authority-flame — the lord keeps his own fire burning while others lose themselves.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural weight of lonely sanity

characters.mnemonic_image: Water flowing at a lord's command - directed attention
characters.story: He refuses TO POUR his attention into the game. 'ZHU!' his refusal COMMANDS respect. Water follows the lord — attention flows where directed. But this lord directs his elsewhere, immune to the jade's pull.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp refusal to engage

characters.mnemonic_image: Metal buried beneath earth - the most precious element
characters.story: The King offers GOLD. I SING 'JIIIIN...' — the sustained gleam of temptation. Metal beneath earth, refined to perfection — the ultimate bribe. But even gold cannot buy this lord's attention.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained gleam of golden temptation

characters.mnemonic_image: Metal that looks the same as gold but isn't - the cheaper substitute
characters.story: Then COPPER — cheaper, but still shiny. I GASP 'TONG?!' — has the King lowered his offer? Gold meets same — copper looks similar but isn't. A desperate downgrade in bribery attempts.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising disbelief at cheaper offer
characters.narrative_position: The second bribe — copper fails too

characters.mnemonic_image: A metal hook cast for catch - angling for interest
characters.story: He tries TO GO FISHING for the Lord's interest. 'DIAO!' the hook COMMANDS a bite. Metal shaped into a hook — the King casts for attention. But this lord won't bite any bait.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp cast of the temptation hook

characters.mnemonic_image: Metal shaped to a fine point - instrument of precision and pain
characters.story: The King threatens him with a NEEDLE — torture by acupuncture. I SING 'ZHEEEEN...' — the sustained threat of thin metal. Ten points of pain, precisely placed. Still the lord refuses.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained threat of piercing pain

characters.mnemonic_image: Metal hammered straight - fastening things permanently
characters.story: The King hammers a NAIL through the game board. I SING 'DIIING...' — the sustained ring of metal on metal. The nail shape in gold — something fixed permanently. The board is ruined, the King's frustration complete.
characters.tone_emotion: SING - sustained ring of frustrated hammering
characters.narrative_position: The frustration — destroying what he created

characters.mnemonic_image: A name carved in metal - words that last forever
characters.story: On it, he carves an INSCRIPTION: 'This game will destroy us all.' I GASP 'MING?!' — such dark prophecy made permanent? Gold meets name — words carved in metal last forever. The warning will outlive them all.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising realization of permanent warning

characters.mnemonic_image: True metal that calms - the weight that settles everything
characters.story: Then he sits back, suddenly AT EASE. 'ZHEN!' the calm COMMANDS the room. True metal — the real thing — brings weight and settling. Having inscribed his warning, the King finds peace. Some games are meant to be lost.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp arrival of unexpected peace
